description: Plans for a facility near Peel should not have been independently reviewed, a local authority says.
title: Referral of Isle of Man sewage plant plans questioned
title_page: Referral of Isle of Man sewage plant plans questioned - BBC News
maintext: Calling for the matter to be investigated by a parliamentary scrutiny committee, Mr Anderson said while the board was in favour of a facility being built to stop raw sewage being pumped into the sea at Peel, it should not be done "at any expense".
